p: The tripartite alliance (OIE, WHO, and FAO) is launching the Global Early Warning System, a common platform for the three organizations to interconnect data and improve global early warning. The focus of their action was the prevention of the phenomenon of emergence and the gradual reduction of notifiable diseases.
